snippet: A head-on collision between a passenger bus and a truck killed at least 61 people in the deadliest road accident in recent memory in the country, officials and witnesses said Thursday.
abstract: At least 61 people are killed in head-on collision between passenger bus and truck in central Ghana in what officials say is deadliest road accident in recent memory.
lead_paragraph: A head-on collision between a passenger bus and a truck killed at least 61 people in the deadliest road accident in recent memory in the country, officials and witnesses said Thursday.

headline.main: Ghana: Dozens Killed in Road Accident
headline.print_headline: Africa; Ghana: Dozens Killed in Road Accident
